Anna Amelia Kraich

  1. Foster Name: Anna Amelia
  2. Foster Family: Jesse B. and Lottie Douglas
  3. Location of Family: Tecumseh, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Tecumseh, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 7
  7. Date of Birth: 9/16/1907, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1/20/1991
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Anna Amelia Lougee
  11. Spouse Name: Hommer E. Lougee
  12. Source: Tecumseh Chieftain, 17 October 1914; Find-A-Grave for Anna Amelia Kraich Douglas Lougee; "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; National Orphan Train Complex; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories Vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 235-242.
